function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mechanical cooling of supply air to lower high temperatures may not effectively control the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to inadequate temperature control.","Mitigation":"Install additional air purification and filtration systems to reduce the spread of airborne pathogens.","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) systems.","People":"Occupants of the built environment.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers."},{"Description":"Decreased ventilation rates in office rooms to provide ventilation to central meeting rooms may result in poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission due to inadequate ventilation in office spaces.","Mitigation":"Install air quality monitoring systems and adjust ventilation rates based on occupancy and activity levels.","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, carbon dioxide sensors, demand-controlled ventilation systems.","People":"Occupants of the office rooms.","Owner":"Facility managers, building maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in the toilets may lead to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to inadequate ventilation in the toilet facilities.","Mitigation":"Implement mechanical ventilation systems with high air exchange rates and air purification equipment.","Technologies":"High-volume low-speed (HVLS) fans, air purification units, mechanical ventilation systems.","People":"Occupants of the built environment.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers."}]}
